data.label: Canticle 1: A Song of Creation

value.halfverse: praise him and magnify him for ever.
value.verse: O all ye works of the Lord, bless ye the Lord; *

value.halfverse: praise him and magnify him for ever.
value.verse: O ye angels of the Lord, bless ye the Lord; *

value.halfverse: O ye waters that be above the firmament, bless ye the Lord;
value.verse: O ye heavens, bless ye the Lord; *

value.halfverse: praise him and magnify him for ever.
value.verse: O all ye powers of the Lord, bless ye the Lord; *
O ye sun and moon, bless ye the Lord; *
value.halfverse: O ye stars of heaven, bless ye the Lord;
praise him and magnify him for ever.
value.verse: O ye showers and dew, bless ye the Lord; *

value.halfverse: O ye fire and heat, bless ye the Lord;
value.verse: O ye winds of God, bless ye the Lord; *

value.halfverse: praise him and magnify him for ever.
value.verse: O ye winter and summer, bless ye the Lord; *

value.halfverse: O ye frost and cold, bless ye the Lord;
value.verse: O ye dews and frosts, bless ye the Lord; *
O ye ice and snow, bless ye the Lord; *
value.halfverse: praise him and magnify him for ever.
O ye light and darkness, bless ye the Lord;
value.verse: O ye nights and days, bless ye the Lord; *
O ye lightnings and clouds, bless ye the Lord; *
value.halfverse: praise him and magnify him for ever.

value.label: III		The Earth and its Creatures

value.verse: O let the earth bless the Lord; *
value.halfverse: O ye mountains and hills, bless ye the Lord;
praise him and magnify him for ever.
value.verse: O all ye green things upon the earth, bless ye the Lord; *

value.halfverse: O ye seas and floods, bless ye the Lord;
value.verse: O ye wells, bless ye the Lord; *
O ye whales and all that move in the waters, bless ye the Lord;
value.halfverse: praise him and magnify him for ever.
O all ye beasts and cattle, bless ye the Lord;
value.verse: O all ye fowls of the air, bless ye the Lord; *
O ye children of men, bless ye the Lord; *
value.halfverse: praise him and magnify him for ever.
O ye priests of the Lord, bless ye the Lord;
value.verse: O ye people of God, bless ye the Lord; *
O ye servants of the Lord, bless ye the Lord; *
value.halfverse: praise him and magnify him for ever.

value.verse: O ye spirits and souls of the righteous, bless ye the Lord; *
value.halfverse: O ye holy and humble men of heart, bless ye the Lord.
praise him and magnify him for ever.
value.verse: Let us bless the Father, the Son, and the Holy Spirit; *

data.citation: Song of the Three Young Men, 35-65
